title: Take on the Twisters
overview: Take on the Twisters, a nail-biting quiz show featuring a combination of skill and cunning...and a prize pot of thousands. Hosted by Julia Bradbury, Take on the Twisters is a combination of quick-fire and multiple-choice questions allowing viewers of all quizzing abilities to play along at home. Featuring eight giant timers, the â€˜Twisters', with each running for a different length of time; contestants must use a combination of knowledge and strategy to defeat their opponents in the first part of the show in order to then have a go to Take on the Twisters, where they have the chance to win thousands of pounds.
